column15: Philips HR1361Hand Blender  Best Price Rs 1762.00 Best Discount 7% Off EMI Rs 294 for 6 months FREE Shipping in 2 Days
column17:
This hand blender by Philips is designed to make your everyday tasks easier. Combined with 600 watts power & double-action blade it gives wonderful blended results. Its soft touch grip and buttons make it easy to process & its 0.5 litre beaker can be used for storing. The material of its blade is stainless steel it has got a 1.3m power cord.

  • Brand: Philips
  • Category: Appliances
  • Product Type: Hand Blender
  • Voltage: 220-240V
  • Power Consumption (watts): 600W
  • Frequency: 50/60Hz
  • Cord length: 1.3m
  • Speed Control: 2 Speed
  • Material Jars: SAN
  • Material housing: PP and rubber
  • Material blade: Stainless steel
  • Accessories: Beaker with Lid
